function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disputes between client and contractor regarding loss-sharing and claims due to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased conflict and delays in project delivery","Mitigation":"Implement a risk and reward sharing type procurement route, value-driven project delivery model, and target sum procurement routes","Technologies":"Value-driven facility management, BIM, IoT, collaboration software","People":"Client, contractor, key stakeholders","Owner":"Project managers, procurement professionals"},{"Description":"Increased workload on blue-collar workers due to the need for facility management services and creating a safer workplace for workers","Impact":"Risk of worker burnout and decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Implement value-driven facility management, encourage innovation, and provide economic justification for the workload","Technologies":"BIM, IoT, collaboration software, robots","People":"Blue-collar workers, facility management staff","Owner":"Facility managers, innovation team"},{"Description":"Unforeseen delays, inflation, and weather impacts affecting project scope, scheduling, and costing","Impact":"Project delays and cost overruns","Mitigation":"Collaborative planning, value engineering process, and value integrated bidding process for public projects","Technologies":"Collaboration software, value engineering tools","People":"Client, contractor, project planners","Owner":"Project managers, government"}]}
